title: Benihana serves Hibachi Tuna medium rare
statement: Benihana's Hibachi Tuna is sesame crusted tuna steak served medium rare with tomato, avocado and edamame in white balsamic sauce.

citations.quote: HIBACHI TUNA* Sesame crusted tuna steak with tomato, avocado and edamame in a white balsamic sauce. Served medium rare.
